title: "Bike Data"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


## Preprocessing data set
```{r}
dat <- read.csv("day.csv")

```

## Reading the data set
```{r}
str(dat)
summary(dat)
```

## Exploring the data set

```{r}
plot(dat$cnt~dat$dteday,pch=".",ylab="bikes rented",xlab="date")
```
```{r}
boxplot(dat$cnt~dat$weathersit,xlim=c(0,4),pch=20,names=c("clear","misty","light rain"),ylab="bikes rented")
```
```{r}
boxplot(dat$cnt~dat$season,names=c("spring","summer","fall","winter"),ylab="bikes rented")
```
```{r}
plot(dat$cnt~dat$temp,pch=".",xlab="temperature",ylab="bikes rented")
```

```{r}
boxplot(dat$cnt~dat$holiday,names=c("not holiday","holiday"),ylab="bikes rented")
```
